question:
Which of the following are the characteristics of estuaries?
1. It is a semi enclosed coastal body of water with one or more rivers or streams flowing into it.
2. It has a free connection with open sea.
3. An estuary has very little wave action, so it provides a calm refuge from the open sea.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Estuaries are semi enclosed coastal bodies of water with one or more rivers or streams flowing into it. They have a free connection with open sea and have very little wave action, so it provides a calm refuge from the open sea.
